meanings.sent1: She is the gabbiest girl in our class, always chatting with everyone.
meanings.sent2: The gabbiest parrot in the pet store entertained customers with its constant chatter.
meanings.sent3: The gabbiest squirrel in the park had a lot to say about the other animals.
meanings.sent4: Her gabbiest nature was like a bubbling brook, never running out of words.
meanings.sent5: The gabbiest child at the party kept everyone entertained with their stories.

meanings.sent1: My aunt is the gabbiest at family gatherings, sharing stories non-stop.
meanings.sent2: The gabbiest in the office always has the latest gossip to share.
meanings.sent3: The gabbiest at the party had everyone laughing with their jokes.
meanings.sent4: The gabbiest in the group was like a radio that never turned off.
meanings.sent5: The gabbiest student in the class was known for asking endless questions.

meanings.definition: Full of idle talk or chatter
meanings.sent1: The gabbiest meeting I've ever attended seemed to go on forever.
meanings.sent2: The gabbiest cat in the neighborhood would meow at all hours of the night.
meanings.sent3: The gabbiest group of birds on the tree branch made quite a racket.
meanings.sent4: Her gabbiest mood was like a noisy radio that couldn't be turned down.
meanings.sent5: The gabbiest stream of gossip flowed through the office, spreading rumors.
